Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. It's not just an object; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe its true value exceeds $15000. Considering its exceptional qualities, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $18000. I understand that this might be a significant investment, but I assure you, it will be a worthwhile one. If you're interested in learning more about how this product can benefit you or if you have any questions, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
